comments.creator: rkent@caspia.com
comments.raw_text: For normal incoming filters, they apply by default only to the inbox. If the user sets the filter to apply post classification, these restrictions do not apply, and the filter can do some strange things if the user is not expecting it.
comments.text: For normal incoming filters, they apply by default only to the inbox. If the user sets the filter to apply post classification, these restrictions do not apply, and the filter can do some strange things if the user is not expecting it.
